input.sentences: a couple decided to be dare devils and go out on a volcano .
they were extremely scared | but they were impressed at themselves for achieving it .
once they got passed the scary part | they were able to see a beautiful area .
they had to breathe in a lot of smoke .
once they got off the volcano | they came across a sculpture .
output.sentences: On our vacation we took a tour of the Devil's Volcano.
We were impressed by the volcanic activity; but extremely scared at the same time.
At the top it was scary but when we got passed it, it was absolutely beautiful.
There was a lot of smoke making it hard to breathe.
I took a picture of the volcano sculpture when we got back from the tour.
